thread.title: Tom Kü
thread.title_full: Sommerjung - Ferienlager für Erwachsene bewertet von Tom Kü

author: Tom Kü
title: Tom Kü
text: We arrived at the camp pretty early and so had some time to get to know the area, had a chat with the busy team about everything we needed to know and they took great care about us even though there were plenty of other things to do. When all the camp participants had arrived, the weekend was about to start. The meals were nice, the games and courses were great but also really exhausting (Ultimate Frisbee! Water Battle!!! Parcour!) and so, no matter what you booked, the Nature-Ticket(bring your own tent, mixed genders possible) or the Camper Ticket(sleep with your guys/gals and leave your snoring girl-/boyfriend in another one), you sure slept tight as hell. It was uber-fun, peaceful, easy-going and relieving. Oh, did I mention no cellphones allowed? Completely forgot about that. It was the same on that weekend. I didn't even think about it once.
